history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08173
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9184, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE GOVERNMENT PROCUREMENT REFORM ACT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to give equal opportunities and competitiveness to eligible and qualified private contracting parties in all government procurements among domestic and foreign suppliers.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GATCHALIAN, WES
DATE FILED : 2018-09-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
